required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Coping After Breast Cancer - CABC - Stressmestring Etter Brystkreft - SEB

brief_summary.textblock:
1. Determine the level of common HRQoL issues among breast cancer patients just after diagnosis and later compared with age-matched controls without breast cancer.
2. Modify digital interventions for cancer stress management, CBSM and MBI, based on existing interventions and expertise in clinical medicine as well as information technology expertise.
3. Determine the acceptability and feasibility of two (CBSM and MBI) digital intervention programs for patients with breast cancer.
4. Determine whether digital CBSM or MBI can effectively improve HRQoL (or avoid onset of HRQoL problems) for patients with breast cancer, compared to a control group, in a randomized clinical trial.

detailed_description.textblock:
After completing the baseline HRQoL assessment, eligible breast cancer patients will be invited to participate in a clinical trial.
This protocol focuses on the clinical trial.
Those who are willing will be randomly allocated to one of the following arms: a) Digital cognitive based stress management, b) Digital mindfulness based intervention or c) Control group.
The intervention is based on a revised version of the Stressproffen app, which was developed by the Oslo University Hospital (Lise Solberg Nes, Elin Børøsund and others).

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Initially a descriptive study of all breast cancer patients and non-cancer controls. Then an intervention study of breast cancer patients with two digital intervention arms and one control group.

primary_outcome.description: EORTC health related quality of life (HRQoL) general questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
EORTC health related quality of life (HRQoL) general questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
EORTC health related quality of life (HRQoL) general questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
EORTC health related quality of life (HRQoL) general questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
EORTC health related quality of life (HRQoL) breast cancer questionnaire. Unit is summary score.

EORTC health related quality of life (HRQoL) breast cancer questionnaire. Unit is summary score.

secondary_outcome.description: neuropathy questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
Chalders' fatigue questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
PHQ-4 questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
Baer 2006 mindfulness questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
Cohens perceived stress scale. Unit is summary score.
TOMCATS questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
selected questions fro SUSSH questionnaire. Unit is summary score.
SF-36 questionnaire. Unit is summary score.

arm_group.description: Cognitive based digital intervention (Stressproffen cognitive arm, Stressproffen 2A)
Mindfulness based digital intervention (Stressproffen mindfulness arm, Stressproffen 2B)

intervention.description: The participants will download an app (Stressproffen 2A) with cognitive based stress management.
The participants will download an app (Stressproffen 2B) with mindfulness based intervention
The participants will receive no app. (They will be able to download it after the end of the 3 year study).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- first occurrence breast cancer diagnosed from Jan 1, 2020
- non-metastatic cancer stage 0-III
- HER2+ or triple negative
- (may later include other ER+ if not conflict with recruitment for EMIT/OPTIMA)
Exclusion Criteria:
- None

provided_document.document_type: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan
